title: SOLD: T3 "Trying To Catch Him Napping"
author: Big Six

posts.post_title: SOLD: T3 "Trying To Catch Him Napping"
posts.post_content:
Thought this was Hal Chase...seems it isn't so I don't need it anymore...would like to recoup my investment...SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/BigSix/hal-chase/11653/1911-t3-turkey-red[/IMG]

Card has pinhole (common for this issue) and the name "Thomas" is written in neat script in light pencil in upper right hand corner of reverse.  Still a nice example.

Matt, I'll take it, will send you a pm

DJ

[quote name="x2drich2000" post=1153557]Matt, I'll take it, will send you a pm

DJ[/QUOTE]

Thanks DJ...I will ping you early next week to be sure you're ready for me to drop it in the mail!
